id.description: A unique UUID assocaited with each event used for deduplication.

offset.description: This field is only used when directly consuming from the connect api to indicate the offset for resuming.  Connect integrations will always have this value set to 0.

occurred.description: The time the event occured as an iso8601 UTC timestamp.

processed.description: The time the event was processed as an iso8601 UTC timestamp.

device.description: An object describing attributes of the device.  Only one channel association will be given.

ios_channel.description: The IOS channel the device is associated with.

android_channel.description: The Android channel the device is assocaited with.

amazon_channel.description: The Amazon channel the device is assocaited with.

named_user_id.description: The named user assocaited with the device.

app_version.description: Indicates the version of the application

connection_type.description: Indicates if the connection is WIFI or 3g etc..

push_opt_in.description: Indicates if the device is opted in for push

locale_country_code.description: Indicates the countries locale country code

device_os.description: Indicates the devices operating system of IOS or android and possibly version

locale_timezone.description: Indicates the timezone for the device

carrier.description: Indicates the carrier on which the device is active

locale_language_code.description: Indicates the locale language code for the device

location_enabled.description: Indicates if the device has location tracking enabled

background_push_enabled.description: Indicates if the device has background push enabled

ua_sdk_version.description: Indicates what version of the ua sdk is in use

location_permission.description: Indicates if the device has permission to use the location information for enhancing user experience
